name: Ridha Mahmood
title: B.S. Computer Science Candidate | Software Engineering Minor
summary: Computer Science student with hands-on experience in automation, data integrity, and building small web apps. Comfortable shipping projects end-to-end and explaining technical choices clearly.

bullets: Maintained and iterated Microsoft Power Automate workflows for invoice intake/approvals, reducing manual touches.
Integrated Microsoft Dynamics NAV and Excel validation checks to remove duplicates and surface exceptions.
Operated VM-based jobs; wrote simple runbooks/failover steps to keep processing reliable during peak volume.
Audited vendor accounts and reconciled statements in QuickBooks/Excel.
Simplified monthly reports by cleaning inputs and documenting repeatable steps.

projects.name: Ridha-GPT (Personal Résumé Assistant)
projects.desc: ChatGPT-style site that answers questions about my résumé in full sentences using RAG.
details: Frontend: React + Vite + Tailwind; Functions: Netlify (JavaScript).
Answers only from resume.json when asked about me; falls back to general answers via OpenAI for non-personal questions.

projects.name: Python Discord Bot
details: Cog-based bot with !ping, !roll, and per-server TODOs with SQLite persistence.
Added GitHub Actions CI, structured logging, dotenv secrets, and Dockerfile.

projects.name: AI Accessibility Website
details: Responsive site with WCAG 2.1 semantics, ARIA, and keyboard-only navigation.
Used Lighthouse/axe checks and fixed contrast/heading issues.

education.degree: B.S. in Computer Science (Minor: Software Engineering)
